name: Puzzity - A Gravity Puzzle Game
description:
Puzzity is a first-person puzzle game where you have to escape different levels by putting a box on top of a button, sounds easy right? Well, putting the box on the button is the easy part but to get to the button you'll have to alter the gravity inside the room. And you can't just change it whenever you want. To change the gravity you'll have to stand on marked positions inside the room and figure out which way is the right way to the button.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Space: Jump
Right Mouse: Pick Up Box
Left Mouse: Choose Position Gravity
G: Activate Zero Gravity
N: Normalize Gravity
